net.sf.kdgcommons.sql

Class JDBCUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.kdgcommons.sql.JDBCUtil

  • public class JDBCUtil
extends Object
    Static utility methods for working at the JDBC level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDBCUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closeQuietly(Connection cxt)
      Closes the passed Connection ignoring exceptions.
      static void closeQuietly(ResultSet rslt)
      Closes the passed ResultSet ignoring exceptions.
      static void closeQuietly(Statement stmt)
      Closes the passed ResultSet ignoring exceptions.
      static List<Map<String,Object>> executeQuery(Connection cxt, String sql, Object... args)
      Executes a query and returns the results, ensuring that the created statement and resultset are closed.
      static int executeUpdate(Connection cxt, String sql, Object... args)
      Executes an update and returns the results, ensuring that the created statement is closed.
      static PreparedStatement prepare(Connection cxt, String sql, Object... args)
      Creates a PreparedStatement from the passed SQL statement, populating its bind variables.
      static List<Map<String,Object>> retrieve(ResultSet rslt)
      Iterates through the passed ResultSet, converting each row into a Map, where keys are the column names as retrieved from metadata, and values are the result of calling getObject().

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBCUtil

        public JDBCUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public static List<Map<String,Object>> executeQuery(Connection cxt,
                                                    String sql,
                                                    Object... args)
                                             throws SQLException
        Executes a query and returns the results, ensuring that the created statement and resultset are closed.
        Parameters:
        args - Bind values for the query. May be empty.
        Returns:
        A list of maps, where each entry in the list represents a row from the results, and the keys in the map represent the column names.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        Since:
        1.0.17

      • executeUpdate

        public static int executeUpdate(Connection cxt,
                                String sql,
                                Object... args)
                         throws SQLException
        Executes an update and returns the results, ensuring that the created statement is closed.
        Parameters:
        args - Parameters for the query. May be empty.
        Returns:
        The number of rows updated by this statement.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        Since:
        1.0.17

      • prepare

        public static PreparedStatement prepare(Connection cxt,
                                        String sql,
                                        Object... args)
                                 throws SQLException
        Creates a PreparedStatement from the passed SQL statement, populating its bind variables.

        Caller is responsible for closing the statement after use.

        Parameters:
        args - Bind values for the query. May be empty.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        Since:
        1.0.17

      • retrieve

        public static List<Map<String,Object>> retrieve(ResultSet rslt)
                                         throws SQLException
        Iterates through the passed ResultSet, converting each row into a Map, where keys are the column names as retrieved from metadata, and values are the result of calling getObject().

        Caller is responsible for closing the ResultSet after use.

        Throws:
        SQLException
        Since:
        1.0.17

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(Connection cxt)
        Closes the passed Connection ignoring exceptions. This is usually called in a finally block, and throwing an exception there would overwrite any exception thrown by the main code (and if there is an exception when closing, there probably was one there as well).

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(Statement stmt)
        Closes the passed ResultSet ignoring exceptions. This is usually called in a finally block, and throwing an exception there would overwrite any exception thrown by the main code (and if there is an exception when closing, there probably was one there as well).

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(ResultSet rslt)
        Closes the passed ResultSet ignoring exceptions. This is usually called in a finally block, and throwing an exception there would overwrite any exception thrown by the main code (and if there is an exception when closing, there probably was one there as well).
